description.value:
Grants User Unnatural Perception (x2), Unnatural Strength (x2), and Unnatural Strength (x2) for 1d5 rounds, for each round under the effects of the drug, permenantly lose 1 point of Perception, Strength, and Toughness.

Requirements

Taking more than one dose within 24 hours forces a cumulative -20 Toughness Test. If failing, drug does nothing and further doses also do nothing for next 24 hours.

Effect: Rare

Notes: -
